thread.title: SEC Votes to Boost Oversight of Mutual Funds
thread.title_full: SEC Votes to Boost Oversight of Mutual Funds - WSJ

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: SEC Votes to Boost Oversight of Mutual Funds
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”U. S. securities regulators ratcheted up a campaign to cut risk in the multitrillion asset-management industry, proposing rules Tuesday to require mutual funds and exchange-traded funds to get a better handle on how they would survive periods of large investor withdrawals.
The Securities and Exchange Commission voted 5-0 to propose the rules, the second in a series of five initiatives the commission is developing to address ongoing concerns that oversight of firms such as BlackRock Inc. and Fidelity Investments... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
